Translations.Text: Zhenzhu que shi shi gu li he guo he zhankai de, ta cong wushengwu zhong zao chu shengwu, cong shengwu zhong zao chu wushengwu. Zhe shi zhenzhu, nimen zenme neng beimiu ne?
Ta shi tian poxiao, ta yi yejian gong ren anxi, yi ri yue gong ren jishi. Zhe shi wanneng zhe quan zhi zhe de buzhi.
Ta wei nimen chuangzao zhuxing, yibian nimen zai ludi he haiyang de chongchong hei'an li jie zhuxing er zunxun zhengdao. Wo wei you zhishi de minzhong que yi jieshi yiqie jixiangle.
Ta cong-geren chuangzao nimen, ranhou, nimen you zhusu di difang, you jicun di difang, wo yi wei neng liaojie de minzhong jieshile yiqie jixiang.

Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yong yushui shi yiqie zhiwu faya, zhang chu cuilu de zhiye, jie chu leilei de guoshi, cong hai zao shu de hua bei zhong jie chu-chuan chuan zao qiu; yong yushui jiaoguan xuduo putao yuan, jiaoguan xiangsi de he bu xiangsi de [mu zai] dun he shiliu, dang guoshu jieguo de shihou, nimen kan kan naxie guoshi he chengshu de qingxing ba. Duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zhenzhu chuangzao jingling, er tamen yi jingling wei zhenzhu de huoban, bingqie wuzhi di ti ta niezao xuduo ernu. Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de!
Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta meiyou pei'ou, zenme hui you ernu ne? Ta ceng chuangzao wanwu, ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.
Zhe shi zhenzhu, nimen de zhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, gu nimen dang chongbai ta. Ta shi wanwu de jianhu zhe.
Zhong mu bunengjian ta, ta que neng jian zhong mu. Ta shi jingming de, shi che zhi de.
Cong nimen de zhu fachu de xuduo mingzheng, yi jianglin nimen; shui zhongshi naxie mingzheng, shui zi shou qi yi; shui hushi naxie mingzheng, shui zi shou qi hai; wo bushi jianhu nimen de.
Wo zheyang chanshu yiqie jixiang, yibian tamen shuo ni ceng yanjiuguo jingdian, yibian wo wei you zhishi de minzhong chanming zhenli.
Ni dang zunshou ni de zhu suo qishi ni de jingdian; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ni dang bi kai yi wu pei zhu de ren.
Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, tamen bi bu yi wu pei zhu. Wo meiyou yi ni wei tamen de baohu zhe, ni ye jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe.

Nimen buyao ruma tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de (ouxiang), yimian tamen yinguo fen he wuzhi er ruma zhenzhu. Wo zheyang yi mei ge minzu de xingwei mihuo tamen, ranhou, tamen zhi guiyu tamen de zhu, er ta yao ba tamen shengqian de xingwei gaosu tamen.

Tamen zhi zhenzhu er fachu zui yanzhong de mengshi, ruguo you yizhong jixiang jianglin tamen, namo, tamen biding quexin ta. Ni shuo:`Yiqie jixiang, zhi zai zhenzhu nali.'Nimen zenme zhidao ne? Dang jixiang jianglin de shihou, tamen huoxu buxin ta.
Wo yao fanzhuan tamen de xin he yan, shi tamen he chuci wei xin yiyang, wo jiang ren sui tamen pang huang zaiguo fen zhi zhong.
